text: Kapha-Balancing Foods (Ayurveda) • Kapha increases with heavy, oily, cold, sweet foods and slow digestion. Balance it with light, warm, dry, spicy, and stimulating foods. Core Principles • Prefer warm > cold, light > heavy, dry > oily. • Choose pungent, bitter, astringent tastes; minimize sweet, sour, salty. • Avoid overeating and late-night meals. Best Foods for Kapha Grains (light, warming) • Barley • Millet (ragi, bajra, jowar) • Quinoa • Brown rice (small quantity) • Avoid: wheat, white rice in excess (too heavy). Lentils & Legumes • Moong dal (yellow or green) • Masoor dal • Chana dal • Green gram • Avoid: urad dal (heavy), rajma (sluggish digestion). Vegetables (light, dry, warming) • Broccoli • Cabbage • Cauliflower • Bitter gourd • Bottle gourd • Carrot • Spinach • Green leafy vegetables • Peas (small amounts) • Minimize: potatoes, sweet potatoes, pumpkin. Fruits (light, astringent) • Apples • Pears • Pomegranate • Berries 1

• Oranges • Grapefruit • Avoid: banana, mango, chikoo, grapes (too sweet/heavy). Nuts & Seeds • Kapha needs very small amounts. • Pumpkin seeds • Sunflower seeds • Avoid mostly: cashews, almonds, peanuts (heavy/greasy). Oils & Fats (keep minimal) • Mustard oil (best) • Olive oil (small) • Ghee (very little) • Dairy • Keep very limited. • Low-fat buttermilk (spiced) • Avoid heavy milk preparation. • Avoid: cold milk, cheese, paneer, curd at night. Spices (critical for Kapha digestion) • Ginger • Black pepper • Turmeric • Cinnamon • Clove • Cardamom • Ajwain • Mustard seeds • Fenugreek • Spices should be used generously. Breakfast Options (Kapha-Friendly) • Ragi dosa with light chutney • Moong dal chilla • Steamed idli (without excess oil) • Upma with extra ginger + vegetables • Vegetable poha (less oil, add lemon) • Snacks • Roasted chana • Fruit bowl (apple/pomegranate) • Lemon water with ginger • Light vegetable soup 2

• Sprout salad (with pepper + lemon) Foods to Avoid (Increase Kapha) • Fried foods • Sweets, chocolates, pastries • Cream, cheese, heavy dairy • Cold drinks, ice cream • Excess ghee or oil • White rice + wheat combinations • Deeply processed snacks • Cold smoothies • Eating late or oversleeping Simple Kapha-Balancing Meal Ideas • Barley khichdi with vegetables • Millet roti + lauki sabzi • Moong dal soup with black pepper • Stir-fried vegetables + quinoa • Light lemon-ginger rice bowl 3
